Question Type: from cause to effect without intervention
Explanation: This question inspects the direct causal link from the cause (Weather data temperature > 25) to the effect (message indicating hot weather). The code snippet explicitly checks the temperature and returns the corresponding message without any external intervention affecting the results.
causal_map: weatherService.getWeatherData(location).temperature > 25 → forecast('It will be hot today in ' + location); weatherService.getWeatherData(location).temperature ≤ 25 → forecast('It will be cold today in ' + location);
causal_map_integration: If the weather service returns a weather object with temperature greater than 25, the forecast method will return a string indicating it will be hot; otherwise, it will indicate it will be cold.
